mid.name: Hydration
entries: Azarketi must regularly submerge themselves in water to rehydrate their water-acclimated skin. After the first 24 hours outside of water, they gain a –1 status penalty to Fortitude saves as their skin cracks and their gills become painful. After 48 hours, they struggle to breathe air and begin to suffocate until returned to water.

mid.name: Swim Away
mid.requirements: The azarketi crab catcher is swimming
mid.trigger: The azarketi crab catcher is targeted with an attack and can see the attacker
entries: The azarketi crab catcher gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack, they {@action Swim} 5 feet.

mid.name: Submerged Stealth
entries: While submerged in water, an azarketi crab catcher gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their {@skill Stealth} check, indicated above.

mid.name: Sea Legs
entries: An azarketi sailor gains a +1 circumstance bonus to {@skill Acrobatics} checks to {@action Balance} and can roll twice and take the better result on checks to {@action Balance} while aboard a ship.

bot.name: Swinging Strike
bot.requirements: The azarketi sailor is hanging from a rope or vine
entries: The azarketi sailor swings a distance equal to up to twice their Speed, moving in a straight line, and makes a single {@action Strike} at any point during the movement.

mid.name: Speaker of the Oceans
entries: An azarketi tide tamer can speak with animals that have the {@trait aquatic} or {@trait amphibious} trait.

bot.name: Aquatic Predator
entries: While submerged in water, an azarketi tide tamer takes advantage of the shifting tides to increase the deadliness of their attacks.
They deal {@damage 2d8} additional damage on a successful weapon {@action Strike} while they are underwater.
